A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wow\, a Star Wars movie that actually passes the Bechdel test! Combined with Carrie Fisher’s moving performance (all the more because of a life that was filled with reasons not to put one’s faith in hope)\, a retort to the typical Star Wars obsession with cocky hotheaded men\, and a more nuanced meditation on the dual presence of light and dark in us all: by far my favorite Star Wars. (Sorry JJ Abrams\, but I still love you!)
